Description: Ostracon, fragment (comprising two pieces joined and another large fragment now detached) of the shoulder section of a red pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior, around the neck, is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of eleven lines of black-painted demotic text. Belongs to EA 58929.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393502) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393502)
